markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slinger's Reflexes](/Feats.aspx?ID=3214) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your ability to react to unexpected circumstances is preternaturally sharp. At the start of each creature's turn, you gain an additional reaction you can use on only that turn to use a gunslinger reaction.
name: Slinger's Reflexes
